## CommonOptions.exclude property

Exclude a subset of files included by [CommonOptions.include](./faastjs.commonoptions.include.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
exclude?: string[];
```

## Remarks

The exclusion can be a directory or glob. Exclusions apply to all included entries.
